head.title: Mohammad Abd Alrahman
head.description: Mohammad Abd Alrahman's portfolio, created by himself!

about.heading: About
about.description: Highly motivated Full-Stack Developer, has a Computer Science and Minor Information Technology degree, and completed a hands-on Full-Stack bootcamp. Worked as a Teacher Assistant in a Full-Stack bootcamp. Specializing in writing clean and high-quality code, using the best-suited algorithms. Fast learner, a team player, with a keen eye for details. Seeking a web developer position to utilize my experience and knowledge.

events.title: Full Stack Web Developer
events.description: An industry-based intensive 4-month coding Bootcamp that covered the entire MERN stack and beyond. Built several end-to-end projects from scratch while adhering to solid OOP principles and communicating with several external APIs.

events.title: BSC of Computer Science and Minor Information Technology
events.description: A bachelor's degree that provided a solid base in computer science and information technologies. Prepared the students to the fields related to computer programming, data processing and database management, analyzed and built computer systems and developed internet websites.

events.title: Teacher Assistant
events.description: Support teachers in implementing the curriculum for a bootcamp class with +20 students and provide one-on-one support to students during the bootcamp.

events.title: Computer Technician
events.description: Responsible for the stability of computers and network, maintenance hardware and software sides, and helping teachers and students in using PCs.

portfolio.heading: Portfolio

projects.name: Halal Alaqsa
projects.title: About Company
projects.about: Halal Al-Aqsa is a new company that guarantee Muslims 100% halal products and give a certification for food complies with the Islamic laws. I made them a website describes the company services.

projects.name: Elevation Job Manager
projects.title: Data Manager
projects.about: A full-Stack application built by a group of three students to help the HR department at Elevation in tracking students' job processes.
